name: LostTillDeath
description:
There are 5 syringes randomly distributed around the house. To get into rooms you have to find the key to the room. You can hide (E = intaeract) in metal closets if he finds you and starts screaming. After the hunt there is a certain break from hunting.This depends on the Difficulty.

Pls write feedback to improve the game,is it to hard?To easy?
